text: Accurate diagnosis of my car cooling coil leak as i topped up few times air con gas and recommended to replace it at a reasonable price. They have a digital machine to check the coil for leak which is more accurate than manual gauges. Staff also gave clear explanation how the cooling fan work.  Able to collect car on the same day and air con is super cold after replacement. Also replaced my rear camera which was blurred. Staff are all polite and helpful. Happy customer and would recommend!
Clean install for underseat sub. Came here before and will come again. Good job Alex and team!

Fantastic service from Alex and his mechanic. No hard selling for a first time driver. Clear, transparent and very very approachable and friendly. Went to change my head unit and fix my lights for sienta, done within an hour plus. Can't say enough about the humble down to earth service, with clear explanations.

Alex is very honest. He’s really explain to
Me in details. And try to save my money as much as he could. It’s definitely a workshop to go to for your air con and other services. You will feel at ease.

Superb service. Responsible and reliable. The owner Alex will not try to upsell but will recommend you something that’s good and within your budget without compromising quality. I did up my car there recently and their service was awesome and their workmanship was meticulous. My car was new and I had some accessories that I needed to install. Alex and his crew automatically installed the accessories without me notifying them. They will treat your car they way they would treat their own. I have nothing but good things to say about Alex and his crew.
